pr_title: IOTDB-851: enhance failure tolerance when recover WAL

timeline.message: WAL will skip error series instead of all series in the device

timeline.bodyText: add comment to explain the reason
timeline.author: mychaow

replies.bodyText: I think it will make others confused in the deserialization of InsertRowPlan. Cause that we should gurantee that the result of serialization and deserialization is the same, this set operation should be better in the here.
replies.author: mychaow

replies.bodyText:
Please put the ((InsertRowPlan) plan).setNeedInferType(false); into the deserialization of InsertRowPlan

I think we should make the two function serialize(ByteBuffer) and Serialize(DataOutputStream)  have same action, so it's not a good way to setNeedInferType in deserialization.
replies.author: mychaow

timeline.bodyText: seems setSchemasAndTransferType  has marked the related data point failed already.
timeline.author: jixuan1989

replies.bodyText:
Hi thank you for your review!
Here i set plan.setNeedInferType(false)
in setSchemasAndTransferType(schemas), it will only execute this.schemas = schemas
it will not mark the data points as failed
replies.author: haimeiguo
